data.comment: The big names in today's match at Cardiff City Stadium have now been confirmed.
Today's referee, John Brooks, has blown to start the match.
In the minute 27, Kieffer Moore (Cardiff) has received a yellow card from John Brooks.
Middlesbrough's George Saville scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Marcus Tavernier.
In the minute 45, The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Cardiff.
Robert Glatzel is replacing Josh Murphy for Cardiff at Cardiff City Stadium.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Chuba Akpom with Britt Assombalonga. This is the first substitution made today by Neil Warnock.
Neil Harris is making the team's second substitution at Cardiff City Stadium with Leandro Bacuna replacing Jordi Osei-Tutu.
Goal! Cardiff go level at 1-1 through Sheyi Ojo in Cardiff.
In the minute 70, Robert Glatzel instrumental with a fine assist.
Djed Spence is on a sub for Marvin Johnson for Middlesbrough.
Neil Harris (Cardiff) is making a third substitution, with Junior Hoilett replacing Sheyi Ojo.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
